page.title: 14LIFE STYLE OF AN MUSLIM BOY
page.content: I live in the west part of Lincoln and I have a big family. My family, religion and future is the most important thing in my life. I have two sisters and two brothers. Only one of my sisters is older than me and the rest are younger. We all get along with each other and are quite happy. The thing I hope is that we all grow up together and live a happy life. My religion is another important thing in my life. It is very important to obey the religion. The religion is Islam. It is very strict. You can do certain things and certain things you can't. You are not allowed to drink alcohol, gamble or eat any pig meat, but you have to fast and prayer five times a day. The other thing which is important is my future and my family's future. I sincerely hope we all have a happy life. Shilpi Bakar.
